param.dialogReference: Prefix of the maps to be output, the final name will be [prefix][field value]
param.pythonReference: Prefix of the maps to be output, the final name will be [prefix][field value]

param.name: transformation
param.expression: Distance | Inverse Distance | Inverse Linear Distance | Binary | Logarithmic
param.dialogReference:
Transformation to be made to the distance measure

  • Distance: No transformation to be made

  • Inverse linear distance: Goes linearly from 0 to 1 where 0 is the maximum distance, and 1 is in the area

  • Binary: Defines just the presence (1) or absence (0) of the selected group

  • Inverse: Calculate 1/Distance
